title: New: Fantastic Fantastic – Houses
body:
Oh my funk.

_Houses_, the latest track from the intoxicatingly danceable duo **Fantastic Fantastic** makes every part of me bob around. It’s playful and fun, but has a certain darkness to it, much like a drunken night in the city. The production is muted and hazy, but doesn’t fail to fly from the speakers, swirling around in it’s almighty funking glory. Stream it below:
